headline: Everest Group Announces Increase to Share Repurchase Authorization and Announces Dividend
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, November 07, 2024--Everest Group, Ltd. announced that its Board of Directors approved an increase of 10 million shares in its share repurchase authorization.

headline: Everest : Appoints Emily Davis to Lead its Reinsurance Global Specialties Business
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda - November 7, 2024 - Everest Reinsurance, the reinsurance division of Everest Group, Ltd. , today announced that Emily Davis has been named Head of its Global Specialties business,...
